articles.title: Laval beats Western to record 10th Vanier Cup title
articles.description: Quarterback Hugo Richard said "preparation and intensity" made the difference on Saturday as the fifth-year pivot led the Laval Rouge et Or to their record tenth title, beating the Western Mustangs 34-20 in the 54th Vanier Cup.
articles.content: Quarterback Hugo Richard said "preparation and intensity" made the difference on Saturday as the fifth-year pivot led the Laval Rouge et Or to their record tenth title, beating the Western Mustangs 34-20 in the 54th Vanier Cup. That preparation showed early a… [+3896 chars]

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Stories of breast cancer survivors inspire artwork, raise funds for charity
articles.description: Katherine Peters, 52 and now cancer-free, was one of 10 people paired up with artists by the Canadian Cancer Society as part of a project to raise awareness and encourage other women to get screened.
articles.content: When Katherine Peters walked into the Galerie MX on Viger Avenue Saturday morning, she was immediately struck by a beautiful piece of art depicting a woman's body covered with vibrant flowers. She didn't realize it at first, but the painting by artist Roxanne… [+1630 chars]
